query.name: Main_QRY
query.script: import com.company.office.entity.Request Request request = params['Request'] return [ ['name' : request.getInstanceName(), 'code' : request.getApplicantCode(), 'email' : request.getApplicant().getEmail()] ]

query.name: Logs_QRY
query.script:
import com.company.office.entity.Request import com.company.office.entity.RequestStep
def steps = [] Request request = params['Request'] for (RequestStep step : request.getSteps()) { steps.add( 'created' : step.getCreateTs().toLocaleString(), 'description' : step.getDescription() ) } params['Steps'] = steps

query.name: Logs_QRY
query.script:
import com.company.office.entity.Request import com.company.office.entity.RequestLog
def logs = [] Request request = params['Request'] for (RequestLog log : request.getLogs()) { logs.add( 'created' : log.getCreateTs().toLocaleString(), 'author' : log.getSender().getName(), 'recipient' : log.getRecepient().getName(), 'info' : log.getInfo() ) } params['Logs'] = logs
